root.name: Mickey Mousecapade
root.description: OverviewMickey Mousecapade is a platformer that follows the adventures of the Disney mascot Mickey Mouse, and his girlfriend Minnie Mouse, as they attempt to rescue Alice from the Disney movie "Alice in Wonderland". The player guides Mickey through the Fun House, the Forest, the Pirate Ship, and finally the Castle. Combat includes Mickey tossing stars at enemies such as snakes and spiders. Mickey can refill portions of his health bar by collecting diamonds that are available throughout the levels.Mickey and Minnie in the Fun House

similar_games.game: Land of Illusion starring Mickey Mouse
